constituent: tune, say, words, keitai, mouth, circumference, running track, soil, dirt, ground, mouth, mouth2
heisigStory: A complete tune is composed not only of a succession of notes but also of one lap of the words that go with it.
koohiiStory1: To tune an old-fashioned radio, you turn the dial the full range of the circumference, until you can clearly hear what´s being said.
koohiiStory2: words + circumference The most catchy tunes are words the go round and round the circuference of your head and you can´t get it out of your mind.
kunYomi: しら.べる、しら.べ、ととの.う、ととの.える
myStory: điều chỉnh. lời nói trong một phạm vi phải được điều chỉnh cho phù hợp
readingExamples: 調べる (しら.べる), 調う (ととの.う), 調える (ととの.える)
words: favourable, promising, satisfactory, in good shape
bad condition, not to work out (ie a deal), disagreement, break-off, disorder, slump, out of form
favourable, doing well, O.K., all right
tune, tone, key, pitch, time, rhythm, vein, mood, way, manner, style, knack, condition, state of health, strain, impetus, spur of the moment, trend
